common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: Use this api to download shipping_document. You have to call v2.logistics.create_shipping_document to create a new shipping document task first and call v2.logistics.get_shipping_document_resut to get the task status second. If the task is READY, you can download this shipping document.

error_list.name: logistics.error_network
error_list.description: System error. Please try again later.

error_list.name: error_permission
error_list.description: Sorry you don't have the permission, detail: {msg}.

error_list.name: error_server
error_list.description: System error. Please try again later.

error_list.name: logistics.unknown_error
error_list.description: Unknown error, please contact Shopee to check. Detail: {msg}

error_list.name: logistics.error_booking_order
error_list.description: This order is matched order with booking, don't need arrange shipment through seller side.

error_list.name: logistics.package_print_failed
error_list.description: Some package failed to print, please try again later. Detail: {msg}

error_list.name: logistics.packages_can_not_download_together
error_list.description: Packages can not download together. Detail: {msg}

error_list.name: logistics.shipping_document_should_print_first
error_list.description: The package can not print now, please create shipping document first.Detail: {msg}

error_list.name: logistics.package_number_not_exist
error_list.description: Please request with package_number for this split order.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no access_token in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no partner_id in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no sign in query.

error_list.name: error_config
error_list.description: Something is wrong, please try again later.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"name":"shipping_document_type","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"NORMAL_AIR_WAYBILL","type":"string","description":"

The type of shipping document. Available values: NORMAL_AIR_WAYBILL, THERMAL_AIR_WAYBILL, NORMAL_JOB_AIR_WAYBILL, THERMAL_JOB_AIR_WAYBILL, THERMAL_UNPACKAGED_LABEL

","key":"hbKannR"},{"name":"order_list","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"","type":"object[]","children":[{"name":"order_sn","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"201118BCKPJQQ8","type":"string","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for an order.","key":"skdyYFG"},{"name":"package_number","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"2485710696837122445","type":"string","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order. You should't fill the field with empty string when there is't a package number.","key":"wGcERca"}],"description":"The list of orders you need to download it's shipping document.","key":"XNNFHts"}],"response_params":[{"name":"waybill","type":"file","sample":"","description":"

The waybill file.

","key":"NpiKDWQ"}]}
response_sample:
[{"type":"JSON","value":"If Success, this api will return a waybill file.
If Fail, this api will return the error message as the example below.
{
    "error":"logistics.xxxxx",
    "message":"The package can not print now, please .......",
    "request_id":"814468c0f07157681b78f6f0b58030db"
}"}]
